scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a bearded figure, likely Christ, holding a globe in his left hand and raising his right hand in a gesture of blessing. He is depicted with a halo. Below him, a kneeling figure, possibly a king or a saint, with a beard and wearing a crown and ornate robes, clasps his hands in prayer. The kneeling figure is also depicted with a halo. The background is filled with decorative elements, suggesting a divine or celestial setting.
